lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid forward Fernando Torres has recovered from a hip problem and been given the all-clear to play in Tuesday's Champions League game at Bayern Munich, the Spanish club have announced.

headline.print_headline: Atletico's Torres Set to Return for Bayern Clash
headline.main: Atletico's Torres Set to Return for Bayern Clash

snippet: Atletico Madrid forward Fernando Torres has recovered from a hip problem and been given the all-clear to play in Tuesday's Champions League game at Bayern Munich, the Spanish club have announced....
